experienced."},{"lineNumber":102141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　話を聞くだけでタメになります」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just listening to their stories is valuable.\""},{"lineNumber":102142,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが異星の話となれば尚更、ですな。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And if it’s stories from other planets, even more so. Mmm mmm mmm.\""},{"lineNumber":102143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人生、死ぬまで勉強ですな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Life is a study until death.\""},{"lineNumber":102144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、いかにも×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, precisely so, indeed.\""},{"lineNumber":102145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……爺なんてどこの国の奴も大して変わらんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Old men, no matter the country, don’t really differ that much.\""},{"lineNumber":102146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ささ、ランス殿も良ければどうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come now, Lord Rance, if you’d like, please join us.\""},{"lineNumber":102147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、上等な茶を淹れましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I shall prepare some fine tea.\""},{"lineNumber":102148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、誰がこんな老人ホームにいられるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, who could stay in a nursing home like this?\""},{"lineNumber":102149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":102150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じ〜〜〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Staaaaare……\""},{"lineNumber":102151,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うお、なんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, what’s that?\""},{"lineNumber":102152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、美味しそうなもの食べてるー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, they’re eating something delicious!\""},{"lineNumber":102153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜う〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah~ uh~...\""},{"lineNumber":102154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほほ、なんじゃアスカよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, what is it, Asuka,"},{"lineNumber":102155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遊んでもらっていたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"were you playing together?\""},{"lineNumber":102156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん〜、たのしい〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah~ it’s fun~\""},{"lineNumber":102157,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうよ、仲良くなったの！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, we’ve become friends!\""},{"lineNumber":102158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、そうかいそうかい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, is that so? Is that so?"},{"lineNumber":102159,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは何かお礼をしなければのう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I must do something to thank you all.\""},{"lineNumber":102160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、お菓子などいかがですかな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, how about some sweets?"},{"lineNumber":102161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　食べていかれるがよい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please, have some.\""},{"lineNumber":102162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい！　ありがとうございます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay! Thank you very much!\""},{"lineNumber":102163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いただきまーす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's eat!\""},{"lineNumber":102164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ま〜す」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Mmm~\""},{"lineNumber":102165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ho ho ho...\""},{"lineNumber":102166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":102167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほんに、かわいいのう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly, how adorable.\""},{"lineNumber":102168,"originalJapaneseLine":"（普段威厳たっぷりにしとる爺共が、","translatedEnglishLine":"(The old men, who usually keep a very dignified air,"},{"lineNumber":102169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チビ組が来た途端でれっでれに……）","translatedEnglishLine":"are utterly doting as soon as the little kids arrive...)"},{"lineNumber":102170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ホント、爺なんてどこの国の奴も変わらんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Really, old men don’t differ much no matter what country they’re from.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂から皆に声をかけさせてもらいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I took the liberty of calling everyone together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仰る通り、題するならば爺集会ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you say, if we were to give it a title, it would be the Old Men’s Gathering."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむむ……俺の知らない間に、
俺の城内で爺ネットワークが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: an old men’s network was formed within my own castle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カバッハーン殿にも参加して欲しかったのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wanted Lord Kabahaan to join us as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は忙しいと断られましたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he declined, saying he is busy right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの方は気難しい方と聞いておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have heard that he is a difficult man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう場には来てくれんかも知れんのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He may not come to gatherings like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この場に……
トーマやレリューコフがいたら、
より面白かったかも知れませんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might have been even more interesting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トーマは確かヘルマンのモヒカン将軍で……
レリューは……髭もじゃ爺か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And Lelyu... he's the bearded old man, isn’t he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……死んでて良かった。
この中にあいつらまでいたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If those two were in here among us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は卒倒していたぞ」
「しかし、別々の国同士の爺が集まって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But old men from different countries gathering together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話なんて合うのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do they really have anything to talk about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふっ、これが中々楽しめるものですぞ」
「皆さん経験豊富な方々。
話を聞くだけでタメになります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just listening to their stories is valuable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが異星の話となれば尚更、ですな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And if it’s stories from other planets, even more so. Mmm mmm mmm."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人生、死ぬまで勉強ですな」
「うむ、いかにも×３」
「……爺なんてどこの国の奴も大して変わらんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Old men, no matter the country, don’t really differ that much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ささ、ランス殿も良ければどうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come now, Lord Rance, if you’d like, please join us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、上等な茶を淹れましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I shall prepare some fine tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、誰がこんな老人ホームにいられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, who could stay in a nursing home like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うお、なんだ？」
「あ、美味しそうなもの食べてるー」
「ほほほ、なんじゃアスカよ、
遊んでもらっていたのか？」
「うん〜、たのしい〜」
「そうよ、仲良くなったの！」
「おお、そうかいそうかい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, is that so? Is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは何かお礼をしなければのう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I must do something to thank you all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、お菓子などいかがですかな？
食べていかれるがよい」
「わーい！　ありがとうございます！」
「いただきまーす！」
「ほっほっほっ……」
「うむうむ……」
「ほんに、かわいいのう」
（普段威厳たっぷりにしとる爺共が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (The old men, who usually keep a very dignified air,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チビ組が来た途端でれっでれに……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are utterly doting as soon as the little kids arrive...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ホント、爺なんてどこの国の奴も変わらんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Really, old men don’t differ much no matter what country they’re from."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ホント、爺なんてどこの国の奴も変わらんな」
